item.description:
While at Clough State Park over the 4th of July weekend, we noticed that the beach and park is pretty quiet, probably because the state is not maintaining it right now. So Liz and I thought it would be a nice place to have a doggie meetup.

We can go for a nice hike around the park and if the weather is good, we can go back to the beach and have a cookout.

The woods and area around the lake are beautiful and offer plenty of places for the dogs to check out and explore.

And if you are not up for a big hike, you can just do a shorter hike and hang out by the beach.

If it's hot....it would be fun for the peeps to swim with the dogs !

If you have a kayak, canoe, swimming bubbles or water toys....feel free to bring them. The lake is beautiful and clean.
item.how_to_find_us: Look and listen for the beagle screaming in the parking lot - Over Heeeeeere !!!

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Clough State Park - Hike and Swim this Sunday, July 19th
